overview:
Michael Olson, AtTask’s Chief Financial Officer (CFO) since December of 2008, is responsible for the overall financial direction and strategy of AtTask as well as the accounting, legal and human resource departments. With over fourteen years of financial management experience in software, hardware, and manufacturing, Mike is passionate about winning. “I love providing real time operating and financial data to help the business succeed and make good decisions,” says Mike. “For me, it’s all about helping my coworkers and AtTask succeed in finding better ways to get things done.” Mike’s experience comes from companies such as inthinc, inc., The SCO Group, and Arthur Andersen.

Mike enjoys playing golf and vacationing with his family whenever a cruise ship or a large mouse is involved.

Olson holds a Bachelors Degree in Finance and a Masters Degree in Accounting from Utah State University and is a Certified Public Accountant. Utah Business Magazine has also acknowledged him as 2010 CFO of the Year.
